Name: Killer in Red
Ingredients: 15 ml Grand Marnier or other cognac orange liqueur
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Coupe glass .
Prepare garnish of drop of rose essential oil.
History: Revealed in January 2017, this is the cocktail after which the Campari Red Diaries’ founding story, Killer in Red is named.
Nutrition: One serving of Killer in Red contains 174 calories
